description.p: Unofficial messaging app based on Telegram Desktop.
Telegram is a popular messaging protocol with encryption and security as its key focus.

screenshot.caption: Main window with compact folders and adaptive chat bubbles enabled. Also features profile pictures rounding (currently set in JSON file).
